name: BUNNY HOOPS
description:
On a beautiful morning bunny decided to go on an adventure.Bunny is tired of being at one place all the time.Bunny isn't getting any younger.Bunny wants to taste new and fresh carrots from different places.Bunny is going to hop around, explore different places and enjoy the thrill of an adventure.Bunny is not afraid of a little danger.The adventure begins. 

Play with your keyboard's arrow keys for movement and the spacebar to jump.
